==Translingual==

===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}} – the cracks in a shell during fortune-telling, an omen.

An [[autological]] character in oracle script: actual cracks in a shell signifying cracks.

# (China) [[mega-]]
# (Vietnam) million, [[mega-]]
